original_title: The Pied Piper from the Faraway Land: Brian Wilson's Fairy Tale Music
overview: "The Pied Piper from the Faraway Land: Brian Wilson's Fairy Tale Music" is an in-depth look at the enigmatic Wilson's reclusive years (1968-75), with special attention on the more dark, personal and self-reflective songs written during this time.
title: The Pied Piper from the Faraway Land: Brian Wilson's Fairy Tale Music
